catalog_info.title: Elementary Modern Eastern Armenian
catalog_info.notes: Armenian BA/BB is an indivisible year-long course. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to the spoken and literary language of the Republic of Armenia. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
